commands.name: Export Table DDL
commands.description: Exports the table DDL to a single file
commands.command: mssql-scripter -S SERVERNAME -d DATABASENAME -U USERNAME -P PASSWORD --include-types Schema UserDefinedDataType UserDefinedTableType Table --display-progress --exclude-headers --file-path C:\Advanced_SQL_Server_Toolkit\DDL_Generator_Utility\Generated_Scripts\PARENTNAME\SERVERNAME\DATABASENAME\PARENTNAME.DATABASENAME.TablesFull.sql

commands.name: Export View, Functions, and Stored Procedures DDL
commands.description: Exports the views, functions and stored procedures DDL to individual files
commands.command: mssql-scripter -S SERVERNAME -d DATABASENAME -U USERNAME -P PASSWORD --include-types UserDefinedFunction View StoredProcedure --display-progress --convert-uddts --file-per-object --exclude-headers --file-path C:\Advanced_SQL_Server_Toolkit\DDL_Generator_Utility\Generated_Scripts\PARENTNAME\SERVERNAME\DATABASENAME\
